title: Mystery-Horror Music
description: Dark and ominous orchestral music for your horror project. Use the provided musical cues to create story and narrative.
longDescription:
Professional music pack created exclusively for game developers. It features 14 loopable musical tracks and 7 variations (39:40 in total)to create tension, atmosphere and fear in horror games.


Create Fear


Each track is uniquely designed, using high quality instruments, recordings and synthesis. Drop one in a scene to prototype musical ideas instantly or use several to create an evolving soundtrack.


Create Narrative


Tracks include dissonant piano, creepy music boxes, mysterious melodies and a demonic choir piece to give your game unique character.

♫ Listen to the Preview:


If you have any questions or would like to hire me to compose custom music for your game, reach me at:


FominComposer@gmail.com


I'm happy to help meet your project’s sound and music needs.
